Actions.Name: Rolling Punch
Actions.Description: Swap places with an adjacent foe, removing and placing both characters. That foe is slashed, then shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Golden Knuckles
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is shoved 1 for every valuables token the [name] is holding.
Actions.Collide: Foe takes 3 damage, once for every valuables token the [name] is holding.
